experiences: As an Associate Product Manager at Crodelia Cruises, I drove key initiatives across both B2B and B2C products, collaborating closely with engineering, design, marketing, and sales teams to deliver end-to-end product solutions.
I owned requirement gathering and market analysis, shaped product features, and prioritized the backlog to align business goals with user needs.
I translated complex business requirements into clear, actionable user stories and worked hands-on with development teams to ensure high-quality execution and on-time launches.
I played a key role in the development of the Group Booking module and a new Admin Portal, enabling more scalable operations and improved internal workflows.
I also contributed to building the new mobile application with improved user experience and CMS integration for dynamic content updates.

As a Product Associate, I worked with the product management team in delivering features that addressed client business challenges, gaining hands-on experience in managing the product lifecycle—from requirement discovery and definition to testing, validation, and release.

I worked directly with global clients, assessing requirement complexity, contributing to effort estimates, and supporting the successful delivery of features for the the Invoice and Credit Memo modules.

From a technical and quality perspective, I oversaw platform integrations leveraging JSON and cXML and ensured product quality by conducting UAT, regression, and API testing to maintain platform stability.
